content: --आत्मन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} high-souled, high-minded, magnanimous, noble; अयं दुरात्मा अथवा महात्मा कौटिल्यः <ls>Mu. 7</ls>; द्विषंति मंदाश्चरितं महात्मनां <ls>Ku. 5. 75</ls>; <ls>U. 1. 49.</ls> {2} illustrious, distinguished, exalted, eminent. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {1} the Supreme Spirit; <ls>Ms. 1. 54.</ls> {2} the great principle, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} intellect of the Sānkhyas. (महात्मवत् means the same as महात्मन्).
